reviews.review: This was fun and welcome extension of the Half Life franchise, short and sweet with little to no complaints about it from me. The end is a wee bit off with the presence of an escort mission but it is not all that difficult and the rest of the game is still very fun. This feels like a natural and great episode sequel to the legendary half life 2.
A continuação da historia, meio curto mas tão bom quanto o primeiro.
Fuckin love half-life series oh my good.
Segue a história do Half-Life 2. Portanto, é indispensável para quem terminou de joga-lo.
Its a nice sequel to HL2 that gets more into depth of what is happening
2. bölüme kıyasla daha kolay ve akıcı

10/10
Masterpiece (the entire series of games and DLCs)

The best physics, animation, sound, AI, narrative, and more. It's all here. I never wanted to give a game a standing ovation so bad in my life.

Perfect in every way! DEVs + management from all the AAA companies pay attention, this is how it's done. In this era of games released half done and buggy (we need a new word now to describe Fallout 76 and Cyberbug garbage BUGGY, instead of just buggy).

Don't forget to watch the fan made/funded 30 min movie The Freeman Chronicles https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6391186/ 8.4/10 (with 22 min behind the scenes footage) 4 years in the making.

Looking at the overwhelmingly positive reviews, it's clear I'm in the minority here when I give it a thumbs down, but I really could not enjoy this game like I did Half Life 2.

We'll start with the negatives and work our way to the positives as I want to end this on a optimistic note. The game starts off okay, nothing crazy good but to rag on the details would be nitpicking. Where it starts to fall off is the 3rd level "Lowlife". To describe, it's essentially a dark and destroyed (parking lot I believe?) and you have to use your flashlight along the way to illuminate your obstacles. This on paper sounds fine, but you have to remember your flashlight has charge. This means that one minute, your cruising along with Alyx blasting away zombies, the next your sitting the dark looking at your pistol LEDs wondering if the battery always took this long to charge. It just makes the pacing feel awkward.

Soon in to the level a new enemy is introduced, called the "Zombine" by Alyx. The only good thing I can say about them is that the name made me chuckle. It's unfortunate because I really like the idea of them, but it just wasn't introduced right. See, one way of attacking is using a grenade to suicide bomb you. This is fine, but not dark corridors where explosive barrels surround you. I mean hey, one wrong misfire at a barrel and you won't have to worry about the place being dark anymore, right? Both the map design here and the Zombine resulted in me getting blown up, and half the time I wouldn't know where or when and sometimes how.

Proceeding deeper into the level we'll encounter the antlions again, only this time they're not our friends anymore. The problem I have was in Half Life 2 they'd only be triggered if you stepped in the sand, which made you think outside of the box and be creative with movement. In this, they keep constantly spawning, in order to stop this you plug them up with usually a car or truck. Again, like the Zombine I like this idea but they end up becoming a chore to do, meanwhile you constantly get hit by antlions while doing it.

Once we get to "Urban Flight" the game gets better, but not by much. The design for this level felt awkward to me, there was one part where the Combine were guarding a gate, and as far as I know, the only way to get in was to charge in guns blazing when the door was occasionally open. For Half Life, this part felt so unnatural, I never think of Half Life as a "run and gun" FPS like Doom, it's more "take your time to think outside the box" type of FPS. Maybe you'll see this as a nitpick, I'll leave it up to you to determine that. 

The rest of the game proceeds fine, but by then were almost at the end. Which is where my final big complaint comes in, for how short this game is, as well as its age, the price doesn't feel worth it. I got this from a Half Life bundle where I got everything Half Life for about 5 or 10 bucks, but 8 bucks for this? You're better spending your money elsewhere, or wait for a sale.

Now for the positives! For a short game, a lot of story happens and I'm really happy about that. It was enough to keep me engaged and motivated when the gameplay let me down at times. And the ending makes me eager in playing Episode Two. To help progress the story, Alyx accompanies you throughout the game and she is a great companion! My favorite thing about her is that she can hack Rollermines to attack the enemy instead which is a cool gameplay idea! (It's just unfortunate it doesn't happen more, maybe in the next episode we get more)

...And that's all the positives I got. It's unfortunate because I really wanted to like this game, especially after a masterpiece like Half Life 2. But I look forward into the next episode with optimism.

super mini pokračovaní Half-life 2 <3 začátek mi přišel nudnej a otravnej než jsem se dostal ke zbraním potom mě to pomalu začalo bavit hodně tmavý místa kde se bez baterky neobejdete  a k tomu se ta baterka vybijí s běhaním takže jsem musel stát nekolikrát na místě a čekat až se mi to dobije a mohl jsem zase něco vidět k tomu mě doslova srala alex furt mi blokovala cestu a byla akorát přítěž ale to je jen pár chyb na kráse :D hra mě začala naplno bavit až v půlce hry byla to super jízda :D jsem rád že to má pokračovaní :) hra mého dětství <3

Серия игр Half-life одна из моих любимых, но не смотря на это я с уверенностью могу назвать эту часть "САМОЙ ХУДШЕЙ Half-life" Я так считаю из-за унылого, короткого сюжета этого эпизода, где всю игры ты просто шатаешься по подземельям сити17 попутно отстреливая зомбарей и комбайнов. И в целом она почти не несёт смысловой нагрузки в серии игр Half-life.

Loved it! This game, as an expansion, adds some new content such as a new enemy (zombine) and expands upon the synths from last game, adds some interesting mechanics/puzzles, and continues the original story. Still looks amazing, and has some really cool graphical scenes too! It does feel a bit short though, being roughly 3 hours for me (have not gotten all achievements yet, but I know it'll be near 6 hours), especially for its current price. But if you snatch it on sale, I assure you the game will be worth it.

TL;DR, graphically great, expands upon original story, adds some new stuff, but is a bit short. For an expansion, though, it is still much better than Blue Shift - 9/10

epic, get this one at sale

Fifteen-years later, this game still holds up with its visuals, atmosphere, soundtrack and unparalleled level-design..

I went straight away for the [i]'One Free Bullet'[/i] achievement in my first run, which requires you to beat the game using only Gravity Gun, Rockets and Grenades. The experience was so good, that I recommend everyone who's played the previous half-life to go for this achievement, it adds a whole level of fun and experimentation to the game-play.

The game is six hours long, but it's as good as, if not, better than Half Life 2 in many aspects. This is how you do a sequel, take steps forward, not backwards.

[b]10/10[/b] "Must play."
It's more Half Life 2, but you start out with the super gravity gun. Pretty cool.

Episode One is kinda meh in comparison to the main HL2 game and Episode Two, but it's worth playing for the story elements. It just doesn't feel like you go very far on your journey to escape City 17. When I got to the end I just had the feeling of..."Is that it?"
A lot of people don't like Episode One. Although it might not be as good as the others in story and polish I think it has some of the best combat sequences and pace in the series.
Its just fucking legendary. Must play. I love Half-Life, every Half-Life game is awesome. Just do it, buy it.
A really nice continuation to the story. It is neither hard nor long. You have more Alyx as well.

[h1] Достойное продолжение второй части [/h1]

[h1] Сюжет вкратце [/h1]
В предыдущей части мы уничтожали цитадель АЛЬЯНСА, но мы не её не уничтожили до конца.
В этой части мы вместе с Аликс Венс спустились в шахту цитадели и направили лучи для уничтожения ядра, по пути борясь с пришельцами.
Когда мы снова попали в CITY-17, мы встречаем наших старых друзей из сопротивления. Наша задача - это покинуть город до взрыва цитадели с ядром, которое взорвет даже город.
По пути мы спасаем жителей и сажаем их на поезд.
В конце мы покидаем город в момент взрыва на поезде.

[h1] Стоит ли играть или нет? [/h1]
Это уже на ваше усмотрение.

[h1] Спасибо за внимание! [/h1]

Half-Life 2结局的续集篇章，属于戈登弗里曼与爱莉克斯的故事没有在城堡奇点爆炸之时结束，二人在弗地冈人的帮助下开始了逃亡之路。
虽然是2的资料片，但是与正篇相比游戏AI进行了升级，你可以通过手电筒引导爱莉克斯击杀你所指向的对象，甚至你在击杀目标后会收到NPC的夸奖和感谢，管道环节你甚至能听到爱莉克斯向你玩起了官方梗，偶尔能听到爱莉克斯对你开的小玩笑。
全篇章最经典的就是地下章了，此篇章可以说是将恐怖氛围推向顶峰，现在想起都会觉得毛骨悚然，不仅仅要考虑弹药还要兼顾能量使用，与爱莉克斯在伸手不见五指的地下等待电梯，与不停出现的尸潮抵抗，漫长的等待与深邃的黑暗无时无刻的在消磨你的意识，你的耳边只听到尸潮的嚎叫以及爱莉克斯的呼救，随着能量的耗尽以及逐渐减少的子弹，氛围逐渐紧张，在你登上电梯的那一刻，仿佛自己就像戈登弗里曼一样绝境逢生，那种求生的气氛渲染简直拍手叫绝！太强了！
本章有诸多时间都会有爱莉克斯的陪伴，与正篇相比，游戏的体验升华了不少，同样敌对ai的数量更多，伤害更高。AI小队系统为你助力，守点任务变得轻松不少，减少了弹尽粮绝的情况。游戏剧情内容相当充实，作为资料片来说已经很让人满意了！值得推荐！
